name: Blast Lock
summary: Sometimes taking the shortest distance between two points involves removing an obstacle or two.

name: Cover Fire
summary: You lay down suppressive fire to protect allies by forcing foes to take cover from your wild attacks.

name: Crossbow Crack Shot
summary: You have a deep understanding of the crossbow.

name: Dual-Weapon Reload (Gunslinger)
summary: You carry your ammunition in a way that allows you to reload while holding two weapons.

name: Hit the Dirt!
summary: You fling yourself out of harm's way.

name: Munitions Crafter
summary: Bullets and bombs can be scarce in some parts, so you've learned to make your own.

name: Sword and Pistol
summary: You're comfortable wielding a firearm or crossbow in one hand and a melee weapon in the other, combining melee attacks with shots from the firearm.

name: Defensive Armaments
summary: You use bulky firearms or crossbows to shield your body from your foes' attacks.

name: Fake Out
summary: With a skilled flourish of your weapon, you force an enemy to acknowledge you as a threat.

name: Pistol Twirl
summary: Your quick gestures and flair for performance distract your opponent, leaving it vulnerable to your follow-up attacks.

name: Quick Draw
summary: You draw your weapon and attack with the same motion.

name: Risky Reload
summary: You've practiced a technique for rapidly reloading your firearm, but attempting to use this technique is a dangerous gamble with your firearm's functionality.

name: Warning Shot
summary: Who needs words when the roar of a gun is so much more succinct?

name: Alchemical Shot
summary: You've practiced a technique for mixing alchemical bombs with your loaded shot.

name: Black Powder Boost
summary: You fire your weapon as you jump, using the kickback to go farther.

name: Greenwatch Initiate
summary: You've received the basic training developed for all Greenwatch recruits.

name: Instant Backup
summary: Even as your firearm misfires, you quickly draw a backup weapon.

name: Ostentatious Reload
summary: Every good Firebrand knows that style can be as important as substanceâ€”so long as you don't screw up the delivery.

name: Paired Shots
summary: Your shots hit simultaneously.

name: Advanced Shooter
summary: You've dedicated your training to the most complex and weird weapons of your favorite group.

name: Cauterize
summary: You use the smoking barrel of your firearm to sear shut a bleeding wound.

name: Defy Fey
summary: You are keen to the wiles of the fey and can usually shake off their magic.

name: Drifter's Juke
summary: You move in and out of range to complement your attacks.

name: Fey Tracker
summary: You are exceptionally skilled at noticing the subtle techniques fey use to avoid notice.

name: Munitions Machinist
summary: You're particularly adept at crafting ammunition and bombs.

name: Nightwave Springing Reload
summary: Training with the crew of the Nightwave has taught you their technique for reloading while leaping to board another ship.

name: Phalanx Breaker
summary: You know that to take out an enemy formation, you must punch a hole through its center.

name: Pistolero's Challenge
summary: With a stern call, carefully chosen barb, or some other challenging declaration, you demand your foe's attention in a duel.

name: Scatter Blast
summary: You pack your weapon with additional shot and powder, creating a risky but devastating wave of destruction.

name: Sniper's Aim
summary: You take an extra moment to carefully sync your aim and breathing, then fire a shot with great accuracy.

name: Triggerbrand Salvo
summary: You slice, stab, or batter your opponent with the melee portion of your combination weapon before pulling the trigger at point-blank range.

name: Bullet Split
summary: You carefully align your weapon with the edge of your blade, splitting the projectile in two as you fire to attack two different targets.

name: Greenwatch Veteran
summary: Your time spent tracking your target allows you to quickly identify its weaknesses and relay them to your allies.

name: Grit and Tenacity
summary: You call upon deep reserves of toughness and mental fortitude to power through an otherwise debilitating effect.

name: Leap and Fire
summary: You're quick enough to line up a shot even while diving to the ground.

name: Smoke Curtain
summary: You load an extra dose of powder into your shot, causing it to belch a cloud of smoke.

name: Stab and Blast
summary: You slice or smash your opponent with the melee portion of your weapon before pulling the trigger at point-blank range.

name: Unseen Passage
summary: You have mastered a magical technique for moving through dangerous woodlands unseen.

name: Called Shot
summary: You target a specific area of your foe's anatomy to debilitating effect.

name: Deflecting Shot
summary: You're always ready to take a quick shot to deflect a weapon or distract a foe enough to render them off target.

name: Greenwatcher
summary: Your experience fighting against and alongside fey creatures is nearly unrivaled.

name: Penetrating Fire
summary: You blast a bullet through one foe and into another.

name: Precious Munitions
summary: You mix flecks of precious materials you've gathered on your journeys into your custom bullets to bring out those properties in your temporary ammunition.

name: Rebounding Assault
summary: You hurl your melee weapon at an opponent, then fire a bullet into the weapon's hilt, making it deal additional damage and bounce back to your grasp.

name: Redirecting Shot
summary: Seeing your ally's attack about to go astray, you fire your weapon to right its course.

name: Trick Shot
summary: You shoot not at your foe but at an object nearby.

name: Twin Shot Knockdown
summary: You fire at an enemy while targeting a part of its anatomy that will disrupt its balance.

name: Blood in the Air
summary: Once you've locked on to a target, little can obscure your aim.

name: Deadeye
summary: You relax your eyes, taking in the presence of hidden things, granting you the ability to locate invisible creatures.

name: Flesh Wound
summary: You fire to ensure that even if your shot doesn't land cleanly, it still lands close enough to deal some damage.

name: Ricochet Shot
summary: You bounce your shot off a nearby surface to strike your opponent from an unexpected angle.

name: Shattering Shot
summary: You fling a bomb into the air and then shoot it with your gun before it falls, raining destruction down over a wide area.

name: Shooter's Camouflage
summary: You specialize in blending into a particular type of environment, able to disappear after taking your shot.

name: Unshakable Grit
summary: You've become hardened by conflict after everything you've faced, and you possess a certain intractable stubbornness.

name: Blast Tackle
summary: You throw yourself at an enemy, bracing your weapon against it and pulling it close before releasing a destructive shot.

name: Come at Me!
summary: You're a legendary duelist, welcoming all challengers, enabling you to challenge many foes even while other challenges are active.

name: Dance of Thunder
summary: Your steps echo with the thunderous retort of exploding black powder as you dance a dance of death.

name: Disruptive Blur
summary: You use cacophonous blasts from your gun or distracting shots from your crossbow to cause momentary diversions, letting you move about the battlefield with impunity.

name: Headshot
summary: You attempt to finish your target with a final, well-placed shot.

name: Showstopper
summary: Your twirling weapons create a grand distraction that's difficult to look away from.

name: Triggerbrand Blitz
summary: You dance through your foes, stabbing and shooting.

name: Two-Weapon Fusillade
summary: You attack with both your weapons in a furious barrage.

name: Fatal Bullet
summary: You're especially talented at striking your enemies in their most vulnerable areas.

name: Hair Trigger
prerequisite: initial deed that allows you to Interact to draw a weapon
summary: No one can react faster than you can pull your trigger.

name: Instant Return
summary: With a single fluid gesture, you catch a projectile out of the air, load it in your weapon, and shoot it back at the attacker.

name: Ricochet Master
summary: You have an eye for angles and can find shots that others believe are impossible.

name: Final Shot
summary: You jam a triple charge of black powder into your weapon to unleash a devastating but risky and inaccurate attack.

name: Piercing Critical
summary: Your attacks with your preferred weapons deal especially devastating wounds.

name: Reach for the Stars
summary: The sky's the limit, as long as you've got enough black powder.

name: Unerring Shot
summary: Your senses are finely tuned to the slightest variations in the air, so much that you can place your shot exactly where you intend to aim it from any range possible with your weapon.

name: Perfect Readiness
summary: You prepare to fire with an instinctive speed and muscle memory that go beyond your conscious thoughts.

name: Ricochet Legend
summary: The more obstacles between you and your target, the deadlier your shots become, as you ricochet off multiple surfaces to hit them.

name: Slinger's Reflexes
summary: Your ability to react to unexpected circumstances is preternaturally sharp.
